item.description:
Hi everyone,

OSDB has taken a couple weeks off from practice. We had some damage to our practice site and practice boat from the storm a couple weeks ago. We sent out our boat to get repairs and we have our older practice boat ready to go.

We have a race in Hartford, CT on August 20th and 21st. We are putting a team together for that event. We will be practicing Wed. from 6-8pm and Sat. from 9-11am.

New members are always welcome to join. If your not a paddler we are always looking for drummers and steerpeople. Come down and check out this fast growing sport. As always your first practice is free.

If you'd like more information please e-mail me or you can check us out on facebook and our website www.oceanstatedragonboat.org.

I look forward to seeing you on the water.

Paddle hard!

Carlos Costa

Director

Ocean State Dragon Boat Club
item.how_to_find_us: Behind the Ocean State Job Lot at the Boating Center
item.name: Practice paddling for the Hartford, CT race
